# promise/spec-only <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow use of non-standard Promise static methods.

### Why is this bad?

Non-standard Promises may cost more maintenance work.

### Examples

Examples of **incorrect** code for this rule:

```js
Promise.done();
```

Examples of **correct** code for this rule:

```js
Promise.resolve();
```

## References

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/55744fd9775a032ea83215dadc77a6bff3e2a87d/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/promise/spec_only.rs)
